03_central_limit_theorem/04_exam3/02_NP_and_bounds_v3

Let random variable \(X\) be normally distributed with mean \(\mu=50\) and standard deviation \(\sigma=8\).


  1. Determine \(x\) such that \(P(X<x)=0.3085\)
  2. Determine \(P(X>52.4)\)
  3. Determine \(P(48.4<X<51.6)\)
  4. Determine \(x\) such that \(P(X>x)=0.4207\)
  5. Determine \(P(X<52.4)\)
